website_summaries.verdict: Ladies love this remodeled version of one of the brand's most popular jackets that provides a tailored, comfortable fit and warmth. Ideal for days when a lightweight jacket will suffice.
pros: A plushy, soft fleece jacket that's ideal for chilly temperatures and layering
Offers lightweight wear and middle-of-the-road warmth
An updated version that has an attractive, fitted waist and overall comfortable fit
cons: The fibers have a tendency to shed, especially when the jacket is new
Not heavy enough to be worn by itself on extremely cold days

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I usually always order a large for a little extra room, but the medium worked just fine for me. I’m 5’5” 140 lbs. I got the black/white one. Only thing I wish is that the waist tightened a bit and maybe if the sleeves were cuffed but those are just personal preferences. Otherwise, it’s so soft and warm
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! I Got it In Garnet Purple. The color is beautiful! It's soft and very warm. It looks great with everything. It does shed. Mostly noticeable on the seatbelt. If you wash the jacket inside out and zipped up, it seems to keep it fluffy and not matted. Follow the care instructions. Looking at buying one in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Mica C

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it SHEDS.
customer_reviews.text: I got a small and I am 5'4 140, 36D and 27 waist. Fits like a dream with a little bit of extra room for bulkier shirts of sweaters. Really happy with this jacket! Update: I wore this for the first time today and it sheds EVERYWHERE. I did not wash it before wearing it. I have it in the wash now... let's hope a good wash fixes the issue because it's no good to me if not... others have said washing doesn't correct it... some don't have this issue... we will see...
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Reddish pink
customer_reviews.text: Today I received this reddish pink jacket. I was expecting a deeper burgundy like it shows in the picture. I am not satisfied. The jacket is soft though. After comparing the quality of this jacket to my original osito jacket, I'm not sure if the jacket I got today is authentic. I've contacted the seller, waiting to hear back. Update - so the seller said that the jacket is authentic and said I could return the jacket for a full refund or keep the jacket and recieve a discount. I chose the latter and got a little over 5 bucks back. Next time I'm just going to get black from TNF official website.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Soft but sheds
customer_reviews.text: This north face was sooo soft we instantly loved it but it kept shedding black fuzzies. So we washed according to directions and line dried and it became worse! Returned as a defective jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Parker

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice jacket, but a bit too thin
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice jacket, but a bit too thin. I was not happy that the North Face tag said $69.00, and I was charged $77.00! The tag also said "irregular," which, if I had known, I would not have purchased the product.
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: I must have
customer_reviews.text: PROS- super warm. compared to my old navy fleece. Im currently wearing it in 40 degree weather and still toasty. For long armed ladies this will fit CON- it does shed I hope this wears of after a while. I will up date this post to see how it washes and if it stops shedding. I ordered a small- Im 5' 3. 120. It fir great. arms are long. which I dont mind (I love to have the extra cover my hands if I dont have gloves on me.) Update It stopped shedding after one wash
customer_reviews.author: pambland

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous after purchasing this jacket because of how many people made complaints about it shedding. I've had it for over a month now and my jacket has not shed once. I've washed it twice, as directed, and still feels super soft. I love The North Face and have another jacket that is a little thicker and heavy duty and it fits perfectly over this jacket. This jacket is great for fall weather and when it's a little chilly, but should not be used as your only winter jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Sizing and quality is not the North Face we know
customer_reviews.text: Not the North Face we are using to having. Ordered a women’s large but it’s thinner and tighter than the Osito 2 we already own in the women’s medium. We were buying the large to replace the medium. It’s as if it’s not labeled correctly.
customer_reviews.author: DMD

customer_reviews.title: The color is pure awesomeness and the the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is pure awesomeness and the the fact that Osito means teddy bear in Spanish fits the texture. Truly luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: The Lummox

customer_reviews.title: Love the weathered black and tin gray "stripe"
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about how I would like a fleece that was described as "striped" - - however, when I put it on, it looks/feels closer to a "tweed" look, which I love. With the black zipper down the front and the black trim around the wrists of the sleeve, it is a step above the fleece jackets I have previously had. Cozy, attractive and functional!! A bit expensive, but I will love wearing it with MANY colors/outfits this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Q

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Alaskan Cruise in June!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this on a Alaskan cruise in June and it was perfect for those days when we had cooler temperatures. I also like that it was light enough that I could tie it around my waist if needed. I have broad shoulders and busty - normally wear a L in most tops and jackets. I ordered the XL in this and was glad I did because it was a looser fit and allowed me to zip it all the way up without being too snug across the chest. I will say that the sleeves were a little too long going to the XL but with the elastic wrist, that was easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: TLM5

customer_reviews.title: So Soft
customer_reviews.text: It is really soft and warm which is perfect for Southern California winter time. My only concern with The North Face Osito's jacket is that over time, the fluffy thick soft jacket becomes flat and looks like one is wearing a worn wet fur. To be fair, it took a couple of years of weekly washing from daily wearing to turn this way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Osito
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with The North Face Osito! I have this in multiple colors. I'm glad they have improved the fit over time. My only complaint, (which I've never had this issue with this jacket before) is the fuzzies it left everywhere! I had green fuzzies all over my shirt and even on the seat belt in the car. I just washed it for the first time, so I'm hoping that takes care of the problem. I realize it might just be the burnt olive dye. Either way-not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleO

customer_reviews.title: It is cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is the worst jacket ever!!! I am a professional woman and I am walking around like Linus from Charlie Brown. There is black fuzz coming off of me and onto other people all the time. It’s all over my pants, my car, my seatbelt, my seats, my bags, etc. This is truly disgusting. It looks like someone hot glued the material together because it’s falling apart. Completely dissatisfied. I attempted to wash it as well but that did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Womack

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket - My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is super soft, warm and lightweight. The turtle neck is very cozy and helps to protect against cold wind around you chest/neck. The zipper are well built so you cannot lose stuff. And there are two nice inside the pockets with zipper to put cell phones or wallet for example. My daugther is 12, so Medium size is a little bit big, but not enough to cause problems and it looks great on her!
customer_reviews.author: C0pperH6ad

customer_reviews.title: So soft.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a teddy bear in this, a warm fuzzy teddy bear. Extended sizing on this product is pretty amazing. Fits pretty true to size and is warm. My only problem is that is does "shed", and leaves little fuzzies- not terribly, but noticeable. I've washed it a few times back to back to try to get it better, seems to be better, but we'll see how it keeps going. I guess for the price, and usual TNF quality, I was a little shocked to be dealing with this so soon after purchase. Would still recommend, but I would say wash a couple times to get the majority of the fuzzies off.
customer_reviews.author: Annabannanna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem like North Face quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. It fits well and it is warm and soft and comfortable. However, almost immediately it began shedding small pieces of lint. Over time it shed more and more, leaving pieces of black lint everywhere. I have several other North Face products and none of them have ever shed like this. I suspect I might have gotten a counterfeit jacket...
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: If it weren't for work, I would have purchased this in another color (besides black). Besides that, this fleece is surprisingly warm. I enjoy the fact it covers your neck. It's easy to warm & hang dry, very soft and well constructed. I wear this over my uniform as I work outdoors ans this adds a layer or warmth and comfort as we are now entering Winter. And those that know North Face products, immediately know what I am wearing. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn From NJ

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long???
customer_reviews.text: I waited so long to get on the North Face bandwagon and I’m kicking myself for not doing it sooner. This jacket is my favorite. It’s softer than any jacket I’ve ever had and it maintains its softness. I lived in Michigan for years and finally got this when I moved to Florida for a trip to Colorado. Let me tell you, this thing is so comfy I continued to wear it in Florida when there was no good reason to lmao. I’d be sweating but super comfy so I didn’t take it off. I’ll tell anyone to get theirselves a couple of these because they’re the best piece of winterwear I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is amazing, so soft and yet so comfortable. It's like wearing a bathrobe and yet very cute and seems sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Even if this is fake, I still love it.
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of reviews stating this jacket sheds. I purchased a black one and have not had that issue at all. It does seem thinner than my original osito but honestly even if it is fake it's a great knock off, I can't even tell. Also, the people complaining about it being ruined after washing - this jacket requires delicate care. Never ever EVER put in the dryer. Great way to instantly ruin your osito. Good for the price, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: legit and warm
customer_reviews.text: It arrived within a week of ordering it. It's legit, comes with the North Face tag and everything. It's lightweight and seems thin but it's pretty warm for about 40 degrees. I got it in black and haven't had any lint/shedding issues that other people mentioned. I'm 5'3 and 130lbs and the medium is perfect. The small would've fit but would've been too form fitting I think. The medium leaves a little room for layering. The sleeves are a good length for my long arms.
customer_reviews.author: JG2

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I find it unsettling when companies do stuff just for the sake of doing things differently. North Face have decided to put a big logo of their company just where the fabric covers the right shoulder blade (scapula). The logo is quite big, and it looks extremely odd. That’s my only problem with the overall look and feel of the product. Had it been possible to give a product three and a half stars, I would have given it three and a half stars because of that logo. I find that it makes an otherwise very good jacket look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Irfan

customer_reviews.title: love this sweater
customer_reviews.text: I love this sweater. It does fit a bit larger, so if you like to wear thick shirts or multiple shirts underneath, this would be perfect. If you like to wear light shirts and not a lot of layers, this may be a little to loose/big for your liking. Overall, I love it. TIp: hang dry to keep fleece in tip top shape. If you don't care, go right ahead and throw it in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Yang

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this jacket! Couldn't decide on what I wanted and I'm so bad at making decisions and my husband told me he thought this one looked the best. I'm so happy I listened. I am 5'1 and around 155 pounds. A large fits me great. I seen somewhere their jackets run small but I just picked the size I would normally wear and it fits great. Very fuzzy and warm. No complaints on it. It keeps me nice and warm. I've also gotten multiple compliments on it too :)
customer_reviews.author: Urianna Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly, but color differs from photo
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Osito II jacket. The first one was off-white (I don't remember the official name of the color) and had to be washed all the time, so I wanted a darker second one. At Dicks Sporting Goods, I had seen a purple jacket - not available anymore - which looked like the one on the photo. I was surprised that the color of my new jacket differed quite a bit. Other than that, it's just the perfect jacket to be worn from October through April (upstate New York!).
customer_reviews.author: Jo Bussler

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Note this is not the "active fit," so it has some extra room through the middle (more of a straight cut). I got the S, but probably could have worn the XS in this jacket, although it's not too large. In the more fitted NF jackets, I wear a S or even an M. My chest and hips measure about 34". I love the bright red color and, more importantly, the fuzzies don't shed, like some other jackets I've had. I'm a freeze baby, so I wear this in the house during the winter. It's soft and snugly. If I was going out, I'd put another jacket over it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Quality Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love my Osito 2 jacket. It is very warm for a fleece type jacket. It is somewhat fitted, but can still be worn over a sweater or sweatshirt. The sleeve length was perfect on me, and my arms are long. It has two very deep inside pockets for your phone, etc., with no zipper. The back is cut a little longer, which looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only problem is that it's TOO comfortable. I never want to take it off
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that it's TOO comfortable. I never want to take it off... It shall become my second skin. I am the jacket now.
customer_reviews.author: 1videochic

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small. Definitely not your normal xxlarge
customer_reviews.text: It is a northface and has the north face quality but I ordered a 2xl and I normally wear an large to xlarge and this was way too small. Definitely not for a larger women or someone with larger shoulders or bigger breasts. Was really Looking forward to a northface that I could use in the spring and fall Months maybe even over a light sweatshirt that why I ordered a size bigger. Could hardly zip it up
customer_reviews.author: Karol G

customer_reviews.title: Soft, luxurious fleece!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to have a casual fleece jacket and for something warm to go under my snowmachine jacket. First, this is super soft!! My students continuously pet it and comment how soft it is. It's also super warm, whether I wear it under my jacket or stand alone, there's a notable difference in comparison to standard fleece jackets. I highly recommend this product. I purchased a 2x and planned for the worse- it to be too small- but it fits perfectly with a comfortable amount of extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Light and cute fit to your body Love the unique color and goes with everything Got a super good deal with amazon and fast shipping Took it to Europe last Month since it was very chilly in Switzerland , France, Luxembourg and Germany It was windy on the Rhine River cruise but kept me very warm and cozy Love the warm and cozy jacket for the winter and early spring Love amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, soft jacket
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teen granddaughter as a gift. This is the second one, as she grew out of the first. It is nice and very soft. TIP: hang dry only, as it will get ugly if you put it in the dryer after washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Luv Amazon

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fleece! So do my cat, puppy, and boyfriend, it is soooo soft and warm, they all wanna lay on me when I wear it. I've been using it as a jacket for the several block walk from the parking lot to my workplace this fall (in Pennsylvania) and it has been plenty warm! I've washed it twice and it's held up great, just lay flat to dry and it looks like new. I've asked for another one for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Allison RM

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous soft!
customer_reviews.text: Size Women 's large is about a ' traditional ' size 12-14. These are wonderfully soft as well as warm. I haven't washed either of these I own, so don't know if that lasts but it's great to start with. The pink color is very light gentle pink rather than garish so pairs well with other colors and is good for those who aren't really pink lovers. Good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Luxury!
customer_reviews.text: This is so luxurious! It's soft, silky and classy. It's lightweight but very warm. I am 5'3", weigh 115 pounds and have a 36 bust. I ordered the medium and it fits perfectly! The sleeves are a tiny bit long, maybe an inch or so, but the elastic at the end keeps the sleeves from hanging over my hands. I have wanted this for a long time but I was a bit hesitant about spending so much. Well, I'm glad I finally treated myself. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynnTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Wow do I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Wow do I love this jacket. It is so warm I will wear it all winter in Chicago. I usually wear size extra large but decided to get a 3X so I can wear sweatshirts and large sweaters under it. It is so perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's warm enough to wear through winter
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket. Didn't know if I liked the "fuzzy" look, but I had complements saying it was a good look. I wore this jacket all winter long and that's saying much for a New England winter. I found it warm and light without bulk. Very machine washable, hung to dry, each time it came out great. Love this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you feel and try on this beautiful jacket, you won’t be able to resist ordering it !
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jacket. It can be semi dressed up, or casual. It’s so soft and luxurious feeling , and looking in the black. I ordered the 3x, I usually order 2 x. The 2x would have fit, but I like the extra room in case I ware anything bulky underneath. I wore it on a Chicago , 28 degree winter day. I went from house to car, outside to restaurant, and back. Never felt a breeze or a chill. It is well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Sheds Terribly
customer_reviews.text: Sheds horribly all over everything! Even passengers who ride with me end up with balls of lint on them! I cannot believe this was a name brand item. I have washed it at least 10 times and now the material doesn't look so good, but it STILL SHEDS! Save your money. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: LCL

customer_reviews.title: Love these jackets!
customer_reviews.text: I love these jackets! They are so comfortable and cozy. Definitely do see the quality going down from year to year though which is sad! Size reference: I am 5’3 102lbs and got the extra small and fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovedogs

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose jacket
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these jackets in black that I bought 10 years ago. I love this one as much as my black one. It’s so warm! If its cold out, layer underneath. When I walk in the morning, I put long under ware on, then a shirt and then a windbreaker. And over all that my North Face Jacket! It’s sooooo cozy and warm. Or just wear it along with a shirt underneath. A great jacket! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Moynahan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a North Face fleece so I shouldn't have to say any more. It is very warm and fluffy and fits great. I run Medium to large and I got the large and I am glad I did. I work at a lake and need something that really works on cold mornings. I don't want to wear a coat this time of year (fall) because it just isn't time yet and it still gets warm during the day. In the morning when it is misty and cold this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Denver1925

customer_reviews.title: My wife-unit loved it
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for a great gift for wife-unit. I had given her a similar North Face in black several years ago and it was showing its age. The quality is every bit as good as the original black one and the color is a little more unique--there are a lot of North Face jackets in black running around!
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Butt

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a large and love it- I have this in red as well- put it on an I did notice fuzz everywhere will be vacuuming the inside to see if that helps
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosha

customer_reviews.title: The jacket kept me very warm in 30 degree weather ...
customer_reviews.text: The jacket kept me very warm in 30 degree weather and kept the wind out! The neck comes up high enough to cover mouth if needed. On thing is to order a size up! I bought a small which is my true size size. It fits well but want more room.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great looking jacket. The color is off-white. It's even warmer than I expected so I'm wearing it into the colder weather. It's also super soft so feels really good to wear. The sleeves are a bit long for me, so I'm always pushing them up. I'd definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bogin

customer_reviews.title: Suuuuper comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: My original Osito II jacket was cut off of me after a car accident and I love it so I needed a replacement pronto. Not sure if my old one stretched out over the past couple of years or if this one is actually a little smaller. Would be a 5 star if it fit the same but in case it’s something due to TNF, it loses 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Fitted
customer_reviews.text: Slim fit so order up if you like a less fitted look. Very warm! I layer it under my Northface 550 down and can withstand 20s weather nicely! Mine did not shed so much even on my dark t-shirt. The price is high but I think it will last.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Good for Fall weather🎃
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 vs 5 because it looks like its super soft fabric vs blanket texture. I used to have a pink n face jacket that had a super shimmery look that was super soft. It wasnt as puffy as this fabric either. It is warm though, which is useful here in Montana. The price for the merlot color was decent. Its puffy but without down alternative is the best way i can describe it. A nice fall jacket.
customer_reviews.author: JudesMommy13

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I do not give this jacket any stars because I do not like the material. The material sheds little balls of fuzz all over everything. When I first got it and wore it I got balls of fuzz all over my clothes. Then when I washed it about 6 times it still does it. I paid $80 for something that I barely wear.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend but love it so much I think I’ll keep it for myself. Don’t worry I’ll order her another one. Delvered on time. When I tracked the pkg a map can up and showed me how many stops the driver had before it would be delivered when it was delivered a picture was posted of the pkg. the price of the jacket was great, upper soft and warm. Couldn’t ask for anything more
customer_reviews.author: bill roberts jr

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is super soft and comes exactly as portrayed in the photo. I am 36 weeks pregnant so i got the size i wear when I’m not normally pregnant but there is room for my belly now although it is hard to zip or rather tight because I’m forcing it. I know once i give birth here soon it will fit as it should
customer_reviews.author: Tiajah G

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and soft
customer_reviews.text: I loooooooove this jacket!!! Keeps me warm and does a much better job than my big burton jacket. Very cozy/soft! Love the high neck! I found that they ran true to size. I’m 5’4” 120lbs and i got size small. Definitely nice fit! Love the green but just recently got the light gray! Great for as low as 30 degree weather!
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is picky but she loves this jacket. Kept her warm on cold mornings. It became her go to jacket before/up to winter time
customer_reviews.author: Dennis76nyc

customer_reviews.title: Sheds like crazy
customer_reviews.text: This jacket will not stop shedding. It's horrible. It is so bad that it even makes fuzz balls on the shirt I am wearing under it. Totally unusable. I washed it several times and no change to the shedding rate.
customer_reviews.author: kayw

customer_reviews.title: Go Up Slightly
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful jacket and I wear a small but sent that one back as it was too tight in the shoulders and the sleeves too short. The medium is perfect. I'm 5"10" and 135 lb I love everything about it and am considering getting another.
customer_reviews.author: Gardenia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite zip up
customer_reviews.text: By far the best sweater I have ever purchased. I wear it instead of my coat most days because it's so warm! I drive truck from coast to coast and it's a pain to carry a big bulky coat with me, so this zip up has been a great purchase! Very soft, and very warm!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Wells

customer_reviews.title: So soft. So cute and fuzzy!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this jacket. It is extremely soft and like being wrapped in a fuzzy blanket. I got a good price on this for Prime Day and I can not wait to wear this in the fall. I love North Face products and their quality is always the best. I bought this in 2 colors - one of me and one for my daughter and they are both great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dodd

customer_reviews.title: This is poor quality and although it says it's north Face
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my daughter and late October and didn't give it to her until Christmas. Why then the time period in which to return it had lapsed. The jacket sheds constantly even after being washed and dried several times. This is poor quality and although it says it's north Face, I have my doubts. I would not buy again from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Trahin

customer_reviews.title: Warm, cozy & dog friendly
customer_reviews.text: Warm, cozy and not a dog fur magnet. I loved my North face crescent hoodie but it’s a terrible fur/hair collector and I can no longer wear it outside of the house. This is an even better replacement with zippered pockets- perfect for collecting chicken eggs. I’ll add that I thought that this jacket would be more grey but it’s navy with pale blue stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: For a cold day
customer_reviews.text: Just like the pics. I bought for my mom she love it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. Definitely looks great and has quickly become her favorite jacket. Feels very soft and is warm. Awesome item for that 'athleisure' outfit. Everyone compliments it
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Scott

customer_reviews.title: The most comforatable fleece jacket EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice jacket, the fleece is soft and comfortable and the color is wonderful. Fleece jackets flood the market and I have quite a few of them, but this jacket is the very best in terms of quality, color and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bacskay

customer_reviews.title: Great jackets, 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love these jackets- this is the 2nd one I've purchased. So soft and warm. With my last one, I noticed it stopped feeling quite as soft (we're talking maybe 2 years of wear), the fleece in the front felt a little matted to me. I'm sure this will happen over time to all of them, I wore the heck out of it. Love my new silver one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute coat and fits snugly, but comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Got a great deal on this and the jacket was just as I have seen at actual North Face stores. Very soft and comfortable. Fits snug around the chest, especially if you’re busty. Every where else fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This fleece jacket is so nice, warm and soft! I bought it to wear at work because I am always cold in the winter, as people fight over the thermostat. I had a hard time spending more money for the north face brand but I do have to say that it is well made and very comfortable. I like the contouring of this jacket it comes slightly in on the waist part on the sides, giving it a little feminine touch. There are tons of pockets both inside and outside which is really nice. Love this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Littlehippie86

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas and she loved it and it fit her perfectly. It is light weight but very warm and so soft! I would highly recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Mishy

customer_reviews.title: Fake North Face
customer_reviews.text: NOT AUTHENTIC NORTH FACE! I’ve bought these jackets from the online North Face store (they didn’t have my size and color otherwise I would have this time too) and never have they shed. This jacket sheds everywhere. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie K

customer_reviews.title: Green different than pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect except the botanical green looks different than the posted photo. It is a solid green color, not at all striped in color tone or texture. It is a beautiful deep green though so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: JandL

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely fits true to size. This is my dead of winter coat. I live in the Midwest so it gets pretty cold. This jacket always keeps me warm. It is extremely well made. This will last for years...The coat is super soft too. I have had zero issues with shedding.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Extremely warm and soft
customer_reviews.text: This coat is extremely warm. I live in New England and this is the only coat I wear all winter. It's also super soft and stylish. The fit is exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jean

customer_reviews.title: Well made, soft jacket
customer_reviews.text: Good quality workmanship. A little on the loose side (for me). Room for long sleeve shirt underneath. Very soft, haven’t worn it yet, (August) but i’m Sure it will be warm. Pleased with this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Asueham

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this jacket so much. We live in GA and it is still in the 90's here but she insists on taking it to school because the A/C is unbearable. So, she says. I think she just loves it and wants to wear it regardless of how hot it is.
customer_reviews.author: nina99

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this jacket!! I believe I had the first Osito that came out years ago and loved it then too! The color is wonderful, it’s SO soft. The pickets zip closed. The neck is perfectly snug around the neck. It’s wonderful!! I will definitely be buying many more colors :) I am 120 pounds and bought the XS and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Aliciana

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color, extremely soft, thick, and keeps me very warm! This is my first ever North Face purchase and I am more than satisfied. For reference, I am 5'3", 98 lbs, and ordered an XS. Fits perfectly to my frame but still roomy enough for a sweater underneath.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket that keeps me warm. I wore this while visiting Washington state for Halloween weekend and it kept me warm. I wear this jacket all winter long.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you like lint everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: This Jacket sheds and messes up your clothes and even your car seat. Defective manufacturing. Washed it to see if it would stop. No it didnt. Sending this back! Terrible! I have to replace clothes because of this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite fall/winter jacket. Keeps you warm. Hang to dry ONLY. Dryer will ruin the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: K-Ella

customer_reviews.title: Love my North Face!
customer_reviews.text: Love my jacket! It is so soft and warm. I've been wearing it on these cool fall mornings when I wake up to 35 degrees then it gets up to 60 during the day! It is light weight but very comfortable and warm. True to size. I am 5 foot 3 and 160 lbs and a large is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect jacket it's extremely comfortable and it looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket it's warm but not too warm it's holding up really well I just don't put it in the dryer I air-dry it have bought two more wish I'd bought it at the beginning of winter will buy more when they're on sale
customer_reviews.author: DollyV

customer_reviews.title: Love it soft and cozy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket i already own one different color and i been wearing it for 3 years now so i wanted different color and i love it. Super solf and cozy and fits well. I wear it daily in spring and fall and in warmer winter too.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Favorite jacket !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a Christmas gift for a family member. I absolutely love this jacket and also own one myself. Sizing was great and it was exactly as pictured. Also very warm, but not irritatingly hot like your average winter jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Kohai

customer_reviews.title: Product not as shown in the picute
customer_reviews.text: Know that Botanical Green is a solid colored jacket and doesn't feature the stripes as shown in the pictures, otherwise the jacket fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: dobiehawks

customer_reviews.title: I like the neck to be tight
customer_reviews.text: The general size is about right, but the cut/fit is boxy, definitely not athletic. The only real complain is the very loose neck. I like the neck to be tight, to keep my neck warm, and keep the heat in.
customer_reviews.author: SylverBullit

customer_reviews.title: vintage white photo not correct def off white
customer_reviews.text: Vintage white not as white as pictured in photo, they should fix this. The vintage white is more champagne colored def off white the phot does not reflect this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D.

customer_reviews.title: When you wear it, you will get lots of compliments!  It looks that nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on, feels terrific, nice and warm. The color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: lBJean

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and fitted
customer_reviews.text: I love the jacket and the brand but the fit was a bit more snug than my last Northface Osito. I like my clothes fitted and I normally wear a small but this is a jacket and I will have shirts underneath so I will have to re evaluate their size chart. I just placed an order for a size medium
customer_reviews.author: Cherie K-R

customer_reviews.title: Light Up the Room Now!!!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is warm and very bright in color. I get many compliments. Neon peach rules. Well worth the purchase price for quality and warmth.
customer_reviews.author: RobinD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I got for my mom for Christmas. She loves purple and soft, warm jackets, and has been loving wearing this in our home and around the house. It came wrapped in plastic at the earliest shipping date stated. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable & stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th NF jacket purchase (of all types/materials) and BY FAR my favorite. Color is blended off white with grey. Collar comes high and the back is a little longer in length than the front. It’s so thick, I sized up for comfort with movement.
customer_reviews.author: coop

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable jacket and worth more than what I paid for it honestly.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my wife as a Christmas present. As you can see in the photo, she loves loves loves this jacket. She says that the jacket is so soft and warm. Not overly warm that you need to take it off at 70 degrees but warm enough that it holds warmth at 50 degrees just fine. I hope that makes sense? The jacket is amazing and the seller was prompt in shipping and most excellent with communication also.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rowland

customer_reviews.title: great jacket
customer_reviews.text: so love this jacket when I get around people I know they have to feel it. its warm and fits great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I like the jacket. It’s nicely fitted and very cozy. Fits according to the size chart. I was disappointed with the way my brand new jacket was packaged though. It was shoved inside of a plastic bag and unzipped which was very odd for a brand new product. More care should be taken when shipping a $100 item.
customer_reviews.author: Review by Rachel

customer_reviews.title: The best, hands down, worth the money.  Don't cut corner getting knock off or fleece that pills n does not stay soft.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love North Face OSITO, So soft, it's awesome. Perfect cause silky soft on inside as well as outside. XL is very generously cut, a little too big but will allow plenty of room for layers. I have this in several colors now, and a couple are two years old, hold up and wash beautifully. Want one in every color!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ AMAZONAHOLIC

customer_reviews.title: Go a size up
customer_reviews.text: Something that I’ve found that for multiple North Face items, is that they run small. Mine fit tight, and I could wear it if I really wanted to, but in the fall, if I was wearing a long sleeve shirt under it, it would be very tight. I would recommend going a size up.
customer_reviews.author: ilovegiraffes

customer_reviews.title: Warmest jacket ever
customer_reviews.text: Warmest jacket I have ever had. I work in an industrial freezer where it is -18 degrees F and I don’t even feel cold. This is the second Osito I own. I would give this ten stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Snoyl0929

customer_reviews.title: Northface Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. The price was a lot better than purchasing it from another sporting goods store. They also didn’t have it in stock. I definitely will purchase through Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Brown

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture of the jacket! Perfect color and fits great, and doesn't she'd like most jackets do!! LOVE NORTH FACE!!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

product_meta.title: The North Face Women's Osito 2 Jacket (Past Season)
feature_bullets: Please note, the logo and hardware color may vary in styles marked as Prior Season.

A re-design of the iconic The North Face® fleece, this incredibly soft fleece jacket is updated with a tailored waist, a cozy oversized collar, and comfortable stretch cuffs and hem for a flattering fit.

Raschel fleece:• Raschel-knit fleece features a supersoft, smooth silken feel.• Brushed inner and outer face creates a deep, plush high pile for warmth retention.• TKA Superstretch woven binding at the cuffs.• Fleece: 315 g/m² fabric weight.• Woven: 251 g/m² fabric weight. Stand collar. Full-length zip. Zip hand pockets. Straight hemline. Logo embroidery at the chest and back shoulder. Fleece: 100% polyester;Cuffs: 93% polyester, 7% elastane. Machine wash
